ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] what's up with the patch today?
ygData.msgSnippet: Makes sense to me since they probably will have some events going on. Can you imagine them trying to do something special to the zones at the same time they
ygData.messageBody:
Makes sense to me since they probably will have some events going on. Can
you imagine them trying to do something "special" to the zones at the same
time they implement a patch? If something went wrong, it'd be difficult to
determine if it was the patch or their "special" event.

---Windleaf

At 11:27 AM 10/31/00 -0500, Stephen E. McCloskey wrote:
>Gordon said "late next week" for the patch.
>
>-Steve
>

> >postponed to an as yet unknown date...
